feature1.explanation: Both texts exhibit the use of various punctuation marks such as hyphens, brackets, colons, commas, and quotation marks in a similar style.

feature2.explanation: Both texts show similarities in lexical variation and word choice, as well as in the grammatical categories and part of speech usage.

feature3.explanation: The texts share similarities in sentence complexity, length, and arrangement, as well as in coherence and cohesion.

feature4.explanation: Both texts exhibit similarities in their narrative styles, tone, and mood, indicating a commonality in text and discourse features.

feature5.explanation: There were no significant spelling or typographical errors identified in either text.

overall.explanation: Considering the consistency in punctuation style, lexical and grammatical features, sentence structure, text and discourse features, as well as the absence of spelling errors, the likelihood of the two texts being written by the same author is moderately high.
